summary: This mod adds the great Adam Adamowicz to the Halls of Sovngarde where he truly belongs.
descriptionHtml:
IF YOU CAN, PLEASE SUBMIT ANY PICTURES YOU HAVE OF OUR GOOD FRIEND HERE. EVEN IF THERE ARE LOOKALIKES, STILL DO IT PLEASE!

R.I.P Adam Adamowicz

As one of Bethesdas main designers, Adam Adamowicz helped reshape the way we all look at RPG\'s now, with his stunning concept design work. His work rings throughout Skyrim: the massive arctic mountainsides, the bizarre and deadly fauna that roam Skyrim, and also the massive array of Dwemer machinery and buildings he specially helped design.

His work didnt start there though. He helped Bethesda in making Fallout 3 in designing some of its greatest icons, like the Laser Rifle, Power Armor, as well as the legendary Shiskebab.

This mod doesnt do much honestly. It simply adds Adam Adamowicz to the Halls of Sovngarde where he truly belongs...amongst the architecture and people he helped imagine and design. May his soul roam forever in the Mead Hall of Shor...
author: Zack Root
